explains: adj. 重大的；决定性的；宿命的

sentences.en: She looked back now to that fateful day in December.
sentences.cn: 她现在回顾十二月里那决定性的一天。

sentences.en: He gave a detailed account of what happened on the fateful night.
sentences.cn: 他对那个决定命运的夜晚所发生的事情做了一个详细的报道。

sentences.en: Doug Vitrano, the litigator, had made the fateful decision to recommend Patrick as the fifth partner.
sentences.cn: 诉讼律师道格·维特拉诺做出了决定，推荐帕特里克担任第五任合伙人。
